description:
Nanoha and Yuuno continue their search for the Jewel Seeds from inside the Arthra. Fate and Alf hunt for the Jewel Seeds while evading the Administrative Bureau. In order to obtain the remaining six Jewel Seeds which have yet to be found, Fate takes a risk...
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Kessen wa Umi no Ue de na no
The Decisive Battle Is to Be Over the Sea
